name: Pset_EnvironmentalImpactIndicators
definition: Environmental impact indicators are related to a given “functional unit” (ISO 14040 concept). An example of functional unit is a "Double glazing window with PVC frame" and the unit to consider is "one square meter of opening elements filled by this product”.Indicators values are valid for the whole life cycle or only a specific phase (see LifeCyclePhase property). Values of all the indicators are expressed per year according to the expected service life. The first five properties capture the characteristics of the functional unit. The following properties are related to environmental indicators.There is a consensus agreement international for the five one. Last ones are not yet fully and formally agreed at the international level.

localizations.name: Indikatoren für die Umweltbeeinflussung
localizations.definition:
Umweltwirkungsindikatoren beziehen sich auf eine gegebene "funktionelle Einheit" (Konzept ISO 14040), wie z.B. ein "Doppelverglasungsfenster mit PVC-Rahmen" und die zu betrachtende Einheit ist "ein Quadratmeter Öffnungselemente, die mit diesem Produkt gefüllt sind".
Indicators Die Werte gelten für den gesamten Lebenszyklus oder nur für eine bestimmte Phase (siehe Eigenschaft LifeCyclePhase).

properties.name: Reference
properties.definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project

localizations.name: Reference
localizations.definition: Référence à l'identifiant d'un type spécifié dans le contexte de ce projet.

localizations.definition: このプロジェクトのための参照記号。

properties.name: FunctionalUnitReference

localizations.name: ReferenceUniteFonctionnelle

localizations.name: 機能単位参照

properties.name: Unit
properties.definition: The unit of the quantity the environmental indicators values are related with.

localizations.name: Unite
localizations.definition: Unité de la quantité prise en compte pour la détermination des impacts environnementaux.

localizations.name: 単位
localizations.definition: 関連する環境指数値の数量単位。

localizations.name: 단위
localizations.definition: 환경 지표 값이 연결된 량의 단위

properties.name: LifeCyclePhase
properties.definition: The whole life cycle or only a given phase  from which environmental data are valid.

localizations.name: PhaseCycleDeVie

localizations.name: ライフサイクルフェーズ
